combat.initiative: d6: 1–3 enemies go first, 4–6 pcs go first. Agility + d6 for individual initiative.
combat.crit: Natural 20: Double damage, armor/protection reduced one tier
combat.fumble: Natural 1: Weapon breaks or is lost (attack), double damage and armor reduced one tier (defence)

difficulty.6: so simple people laugh at you for failing
difficulty.8: routine but some chance of failure
difficulty.10: pretty simple but not simple enough to not roll

healing.rest: Catch your breath, have a drink. Restore d4 hp.
healing.fullSleep: A full night's sleep restores d6 hp.
healing.starvation: Without food or drink no hp is restored when resting and after two days a starving pc loses d4 hp per day.
healing.infection: An infected character does not benefit from resting. Instead, d6 hp is lost daily.

improvement.hp: Roll 6d10. If result ≥ current max hp, increase by d6.
improvement.abilities: Roll d6 against every ability. Results ≥ ability increase by 1 (max +6). Results < ability decrease by 1. Abilities from −3 to +1 always increased by 1 unless result is 1.
